AdTitle.description: A catchy title for the advertisement.

CharacterImagePrompt.description: Detailed prompt for generating the character image. Should describe appearance, clothing, expression, pose, and setting suitable for product demonstration.

ProductImagePrompt.description: Detailed prompt for generating the product image. Should describe the product in an appealing way with good lighting and composition.

Scenes.description: Array of scene descriptions for each video clip.

SceneNumber.description: The sequence number of this scene (1-indexed).

VideoPrompt.description: Detailed prompt for video generation describing the action, camera angles, lighting, and visual elements. The character from the base image should be shown interacting with the product.

NarrationScript.description: The narration text to be spoken during this scene. Empty string if no narration.

HasNarration.description: Whether this scene has voice-over narration.
